content: @G proposal-sif-lang gemini 2026-01-03; N Concept 'SIF-Lang'; N Definition 'Executable SIF: Using SIF as source code instead of Python' -> defines _1; N Component 'Forge Runtime (forge.py)'; N Role 'Semantic Virtual Machine' -> describes _3; N Mechanism 'Cognitive Cache'; N Detail 'JIT compilation of SIF nodes to Python via LLM' -> explains _5; N Detail 'Cache hits run native speed; misses trigger LLM generation' -> extends _6; N Feature 'Self-Healing'; N Detail 'Runtime catches exceptions, re-prompts LLM to fix cached code' -> implements _8; N Benefit 'Zero Technical Debt'; N Detail 'Intent is preserved; implementation is fluid/hallucinated' -> supports _10; N Architecture 'SIF Source -> Forge -> Cache/LLM -> Execution'; E _3 executes _1; E _3 uses _5; E _5 enables _10; E _8 protects _3
